lender.name: TMI
lender.loan_because: We, members of the Indiana University student organization Trockman Microfinance Initiative, loan to further our club's goal of educating our community about the benefits of microfinance, specifically micro-lending.

lender.name: stefan
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to due
lender.occupational_info: I help others in need all day long

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because:
microlending is a method of providing opportunities and empowerment to impoverished people, so that they may improve their quality of life. I enjoy the personal connection derived from lending directly to entrepreneurs as it allows me to gain a more accurate perspective on their way of life and view them as a real person. I am aware that there are billions of people around the world living in poverty. Many of these peoples have the intelligence and the skills to become successful and make a living, but not the necessary capital to start a venture and utilize them. Although I cannot solve the world's poverty by myself, I do choose to take action. If I can make a difference in the life of at least one person, then I can know that I have made an impact and I chose to do something to fight poverty.
I first heard about Kiva in my Economics/Community Service class over the summer. As an assignment we were asked to make a loan through this site. This small foray into microfinance piqued my interest and influenced me to do a project on microlending. I made a presentation that explored the microlending's pros & cons, functionality within the US and within my state, and examined several well known microfinance institutions (Grameen Bank, ACCION, FINCA International). Recently a visit to my school by one of the co-founders of Kiva.org brought this site back to my attention and I was moved to make my own Kiva account.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: Micro credit doesn't need to prove itself anymore . This is the way we can all be part of this movement.
lender.occupational_info: Economic research

lender.name: Jilly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a new life for their families.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need that want to better themselves. =)

lender.name: J√©r√¥me
lender.loan_because: It's a great honnor to help people in real need and do it with other lender. We are part of a new global behavior that is the only response to the emerging human kind crisis.
lender.occupational_info: I make movies that make people and organisation switch their vision of themselves and of the world, in the respect of others and of the planet.

lender.name: Pravin
lender.loan_because: We are responsible to the communities in which we live and work.

lender.name: Romain Briand
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of private individuals to improve equity.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: My mother is an entrepreneur, and I know it takes more than just hard work and a will to succeed to start and run your own business - money is a much needed boost. I can't lend much, but I want to do what I can to help out my fellow human beings. We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I'm attending college to better myself, my skills, and my chances to succeed in life. For a living, I create art to represent ideas, products, or people. I also help edit and maintain websites.

lender.occupational_info: Clients come to me with problems related to computers, programs or electronics, and I try to help them in some novel way.

lender.occupational_info: I check my company's webpages for mistakes.

Mikro-Finanzierung ist ein genialer Weg zur Selbsthilfe!
Das Gr√ºnden eines Kleinstunternehmens in einer wirtschaftlich schwachen Region bildet um sich herum einen Mikro-Wirtschaftsraum. Dieser Mikro-Wirtschaftsraum befruchtet seine n√§here Umgebung. So bildet sich eine Keimzelle f√ºr wirtschaftliches Wachstum und f√∂rdert die Bildung strategischen Wohlstands in der Region.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to help someone to help themselves and their families. God led me here and I hope he will touch the hearts of those that are being helped.

lender.name: Alexa

lender.name: Roxanna Sears
lender.loan_because:
I understand the universal importance of being self-sufficient. This is a human goal we should ALL be allowed the opportunity to achieve. If I, by lending a small sum of money, can help give even one individual the opportunity & enable him/her to independently provide for themselves and their family - I have hope.
If we can find the resources to support even one person in supporting themselves, poverty is doomed to utter extinction. I believe that charity, while important, is only a band-aid, opportunity is the cure.
I'm especially interested in loaning in the education, agriculture and manufacturing sectors.
An old and overused proverb which still rings true:
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can make a small difference in someone's life
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturing

lender.name: Eliane
lender.loan_because: We are all connected and one of the same,all part of the same family - the human family - trying to survive in searching for peace and happiness. If each one of us extends a hand to another (however it may be) we all can get there together... sooner.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work with computers...

lender.name: Infinite
lender.loan_because:
If we do not help now, when will we help?
We should share our happiness and prosperity with those who are not as lucky as us for some reason.

lender.loan_because: it feels great to help people in this creative way. Thanks to the wonderful group at Kiva who help make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: Bringing great books to children around the world. There's something quite universal about that, a bit like Kiva.
